20110104223035.000|20110104223037.000|CC1|   REFRESHINGLY GOOD.           
20110104223037.000|20110104223038.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110104223038.000|20110104223039.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110104223039.000|20110104223043.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110104223043.000|20110104223043.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110104223043.000|20110104223044.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110104223044.000|20110104223044.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110104223044.000|20110104223047.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110104223047.000|20110104223048.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110104223048.000|20110104223051.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110104223051.000|20110104223051.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110104223051.000|20110104223053.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110104223053.000|20110104223053.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110104223053.000|20110104223055.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110104223055.000|20110104223055.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110104223055.000|20110104223057.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110104223057.000|20110104223059.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110104223059.000|20110104223059.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110104223059.000|20110104223100.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110104223100.000|20110104223100.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110104223100.000|20110104223103.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110104223103.000|20110104223103.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110104223103.000|20110104223106.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110104223106.000|20110104223106.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110104223106.000|20110104223109.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110104223109.000|20110104223110.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110104223110.000|20110104223110.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110104223110.000|20110104223112.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110104223112.000|20110104223113.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110104223113.000|20110104223113.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110104223113.000|20110104223116.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110104223116.000|20110104223116.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110104223116.000|20110104223117.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110104223117.000|20110104223119.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110104223119.000|20110104223119.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110104223119.000|20110104223121.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110104223121.000|20110104223121.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110104223121.000|20110104223124.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110104223124.000|20110104223124.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110104223124.000|20110104223126.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110104223126.000|20110104223128.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110104223128.000|20110104223128.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110104223128.000|20110104223130.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110104223130.000|20110104223130.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110104223130.000|20110104223132.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110104223132.000|20110104223132.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110104223132.000|20110104223134.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110104223134.000|20110104223134.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110104223134.000|20110104223136.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110104223136.000|20110104223136.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110104223136.000|20110104223138.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110104223138.000|20110104223138.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110104223138.000|20110104223141.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110104223141.000|20110104223142.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110104223142.000|20110104223144.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110104223144.000|20110104223144.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110104223144.000|20110104223146.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,

20110104223146.000|20110104223149.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.

20110104223149.000|20110104223344.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.
